0.1.0.name: wordpress/rhymebox-widget
0.1.0.description:
This is a widget that allows you to search the rhyming dictionary rhymebox.com. You can choose which language your users will search rhymes in, at the moment english and german are available.

My other plugins

Better tag cloud: I was pretty unhappy with the default WordPress tag cloud widget. This one is more powerful and offers a list HTML markup that is consistent with most other widgets. <br/> Move WordPress comments: This plugin adds a small form to every comment on your blog. The form is only added for admins and allows you to move comments to a different post/page and to fix comment threading.
Theme switch: I like to tweak my main theme that I use on a varity of blogs. If you have ever done this you know how annoying it
